item.description:
Join us for dinner and a movie this Thursday, December 9th! We will meet at 5 PM at Brookline Family Restaurant for a bite to eat, then head over to Coolidge Corner Theatre to see Budrus at 7:15 PM. If you can't make it to dinner, just meet us at the theatre.
*Please order your tickets online ahead of time, as this show is very popular.*

Restaurant Info:
Brookline Family Restaurant
305 Washington Street
Brookline, MA 02445-6817
(617)277-4466
If taking the T, take the D Train to Brookline Village Station.

Theatre Info:
Coolidge Corner Theatre
290 Harvard Street
Brookline, MA 02446
(617)734-2500 (617)734-2501
If taking the T, take the C Train to Coolidge Corner.
Tickets can be purchased at: http://www.coolidge.o...

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Dinner and a Movie
